description: Test suite for the Agent class in the Azure AI Foundry context, testing tool invocation, streaming, asynchronous behavior, and multiple tool calls.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content for a simple query.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool calls during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls detection.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls in a single response for a combined query.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single query, verifying content includes expected keywords.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters invoked by the agent.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters invoked by the agent.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that handles list parameters, verifying correct function invocation.
